name: BlockFall (TopNep123)
description:
BlockFall - Made by Morgan Fitch

A fun and addictive game that'll keep you playing for hours! 

Features

  • An unlimited number of levels to play through! How high can you get?
  • Leaderboards and High Scores! Compete with your friends to see who is better!
  • Increasingly difficult gameplay. The later levels require both speed and precision!

Controls:

Left Arrow - Move Left

Right Arrow - Move Right

Up Arrow - Rotate

Down Arrow - Move Down, Hold to Fall Faster

Space - Instantly Land The Shape

Left/Right Shift - Save/Swap Shapes
